mapper.insert: insert into student(name, no, gender, phone, id_card, is_college, address, degree, graduation_date, clazz_id, student.violation_count, student.violation_score, create_time, update_time) values(#{name}, #{no}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{isCollege}, #{address}, #{degree},#{graduationDate}, #{clazzId} , #{violationCount}, #{violationScore}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update student set violation_count = violation_count + 1, violation_score = violation_score + #{score} where id = #{id}
